title: Background GeoLocation/GPS support
body: As Edge Developers are about to begin implementing Service Workers and the Push API, can I please implore you to consider implementing the following functionality at the same time?

comments.body: As promised/threatened. The TravelManager.PollyFill.js file is all Edge developers need to implement in order to be the first browser out there with supportable background geolocation. See aaa_readme.txt here: - https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/0B7Rmd3Rn8_hDNW1zSWRoXzBTclU
